scripts.build: npm run build-river && npm run build-stdlib && npm run build-nodejs && npm run build-browser
scripts.clean: npm run clean-river && npm run clean-stdlib && npm run clean-nodejs && npm run clean-browser
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall-river && npm run postinstall-stdlib && npm run postinstall-nodejs && npm run postinstall-browser
scripts.postinstall-browser: npm run ln-browser && npm run i-browser
scripts.postinstall-river: npm run ln-river && npm run i-river
scripts.postinstall-nodejs: npm run ln-nodejs && npm run i-nodejs
scripts.postinstall-stdlib: npm run ln-stdlib && npm run i-stdlib
scripts.test: npm run test-river && npm run test-stdlib && npm run test-nodejs && npm run test-browser
